title: FOOD TRUCK HAWAIIAN MACARONI SALAD
directions: In a medium bowl whisk together the half-and-half, mayonnaise, grated onion, dark brown sugar, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 2 teaspoons of pepper until smooth. Refrigerate until needed.
ingredients: 2 cups mayonnaise Duke’s if you can find it
5 green onions white and green parts sliced thin
2 large celery ribs chopped into 1/4-inch pieces
